description: Returns list of matching AMIs with AMI ID, along with other useful information

sort.description: Optional attribute which with to sort the results.

no_result_action.description: What to do when no results are found.

sort_end.description: Which result to end with (when sorting).

hypervisor.description: A hypervisor type type to match (e.g. xen).

sort_start.description: Which result to start with (when sorting).

ami_tags.description: A hash/dictionary of tags to match for the AMI.

sort_order.description: Order in which to sort results.

architecture.description: An architecture type to match (e.g. x86_64).

owner.description: Search AMIs owned by the specified owner

is_public.description: Whether or not the image(s) are public.

sort_tag.description: Tag name with which to sort results.
